lead_paragraph: The Illinois-based energy producer Exelon Corporation has sometimes benefited from close ties with the Obama administration.
snippet: The Illinois-based energy producer Exelon Corporation has sometimes benefited from close ties with the Obama administration....

headline.print_headline: Ties to Obama Aided in Access For Big Utility
headline.main: Ties to Obama Aided in Access for Big Utility
headline.seo: Ties to Obama Aided in Access for Exelon Corporation

abstract: Illinois-based energy producer Exelon Corporation, which operates the nation's largest fleet of nuclear power plants, has sometimes benefited from close ties with the Obama administration; environmental regulations have been drafted in a way that hurt Exelon's competitors, but curb the high cost of compliance for Exelon and its industry allies; White House officials and company executives say the relationship does not reflect favoritism, but rather a shared vision of moving the nation toward a cleaner energy future.
